title: Not just a coincidence?
body: Hey there everyone, just wanted to assure you that yes, you are getting a large amount of trolls in your games lately, I have too. With this in mind, I would like to let you know that I have received 7 Feedback reports in this week alone. This is the best job riot has done with their reporting system in a long time.

replies.body:
Absolutely glorious. 

I am seeing about the same level of trolls (maybe 1 in 20-30 games) but far more tilting feeders than usual.
